DEVICE_EMULATOR.description: Name of the program that allows to imitate the behavior of another program or device.

EMULATOR_AVAILABLE_IMAGES.description: Name of the tab with a list of available operating system images

EMULATOR_AVAILABLE_EMULATORS.description: Name of the tab with a list of available emulators

EMULATOR_DOWNLOAD_IMAGE.description: Button to download the image for an emulator

EMULATOR_RUN_RASPBERRYPI.description: Button that starts the Raspberryi Pi emulator

EMULATOR_RUN_UBUNTU.description: Button that starts the Ubuntu emulator

EMULATOR_DOWNLOAD_QEMU.description: Button that redirects the user to the downloag page of qemu

EMULATOR_STOP_DOWNLOAD.description: Button that interrupts the download process for a chosen image

EMULATOR_STOP.description: Button used to stop an emulator from running

EMULATOR_NO_EXISTING_IMAGE_ERROR.message: La imagen para este emulador no existe en tu computador. Por favor descargue la imagen apropiada antes de tratar de ejecutar un emulador.
EMULATOR_NO_EXISTING_IMAGE_ERROR.description: Error that shows up when the user is trying to run an emulator without having the operating system image

EMULATOR_DOWNLOAD_ERROR.message: No se puede descargar la imagen.
EMULATOR_DOWNLOAD_ERROR.description: Error when loading the download progress for an image

EMULATOR_UNZIP_ERROR.message: No se puede descomprimir el archivo de imagen.
EMULATOR_UNZIP_ERROR.description: Error when unzipping the image archive

EMULATOR_STOP_DOWNLOAD_ERROR.message: No se puede eliminar la carpeta de descarga de imágenes.
EMULATOR_STOP_DOWNLOAD_ERROR.description: Error that shows up when the folder where the image should be downloaded can not be deleted

EMULATOR_NAME.description: Prompt title when choosing a name for an emulator

EMULATOR_CHOOSE_NAME.message: Por favor elija un nombre para su emulador:
EMULATOR_CHOOSE_NAME.description: Prompt text asking the user to input a name for the new emulator

EMULATOR_CREATE_NEW.description: Button to make a new emulator

EMULATOR_RESTART.description: Button to restart an existing emulator

EMULATOR_DELETE.description: Button to permanently delete an existing emulator

EMULATOR_DELETE_EMULATOR_TITLE.description: Title of the confirmation prompt that shows up when the user tries to delete an emulator

EMULATOR_DELETE_EMULATOR_QUESTION.message: ¿Está seguro que desea eliminar permanentemente este emulador?
EMULATOR_DELETE_EMULATOR_QUESTION.description: Question addressed to the user in order to confirm the permanent deletion of an emulator

EMULATOR_INVALID_NAME.message: Por favor elija un nombre válido.
EMULATOR_INVALID_NAME.description: Error that shows up when the user tries to create an emulator using an invalid name

EMULATOR_COPY_FILE_ERROR.message: No se puede cargar la imagen para este emulador
EMULATOR_COPY_FILE_ERROR.description: Error that shows up when the image for an emulator can not be copied

EMULATOR_PROGRESS_ERROR.message: No se puede cargar el progreso de descarga para esta imagen
EMULATOR_PROGRESS_ERROR.description: Error that shows up when the download progress for an image can not be loaded

EMULATOR_MISSING_QEMU_ERROR.description: Error that shows up when the user is trying to run an emulator without having the qemu system installed.

EMULATOR_NO_QEMU_ERROR.message: Por favor instalar qemu para crear un emulador.
EMULATOR_NO_QEMU_ERROR.description: Alert text when the user is trying to create an emulator without having the qemu system installed.

EMULATOR_DELETE_IMAGE_TITLE.description: Title of the confirmation prompt that shows up when the user tries to delete an image

EMULATOR_DELETE_IMAGE_QUESTION.message: ¿Está seguro de querer eliminar permanentemente esta imagen?
EMULATOR_DELETE_IMAGE_QUESTION.description: Question addressed to the user in order to confirm the permanent deletion of an image

EMULATOR_DELETE_IMAGE.description: Button to delete an existing image
